fields.description: (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
fields.label: On a scale of 0 to 10, how likely are you to recommend Prakash Steel Products to a colleague, another business , or a partner ?
What is the main reason for the score you gave ?

fields.description:
• Dimensional Accuracy (size, straightness)
    • Surface Finish of the bars
    • Consistency of material across batches
    • Timeliness of delivery to your site/project
    • Condition of material on arrival
    • Accuracy and availability of Mill Test Certificates (MTCs)
